mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEETING M1 INNER JOIN EXERCISE E1 ON E1.EXERCISE_NO = M1.EXERCISE_NO INNER JOIN USERS U ON M1.USER_NO = U.USER_NO INNER JOIN PHOTO P ON M1.MEETING_NO = P.PHOTO_REFERER_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{user_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEETING VALUES (MEETING_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_no}, #{meeting_max}, #{meeting_min}, #{exercise_no}, SYSDATE, #{start_gather_date}, #{end_gather_date}, #{meeting_date}, #{location1_no}, #{location2_no}, #{meeting_title}, #{meeting_content}, 0, null, 0, #{detail_location}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(MEETING_NO) FROM MEETING WHERE USER_NO = #{param1}

SELECT E.EXERCISE_NAME, L1.LOCATION1_NAME, L2.LOCATION2_NAME, U.USER_NO, U.USER_NICKNAME, U.USER_MESSAGE, U.PROFILE_PHOTO, U.EMAIL, M.MEETING_NO, M.USER_NO, M.MEETING_MAX, M.MEETING_MIN, M.EXERCISE_NO, M.CREATED_AT, M.START_GATHER_DATE, M.END_GATHER_DATE, M.MEETING_DATE, M.LOCATION1_NO, M.LOCATION2_NO, M.MEETING_TITLE, M.MEETING_CONTENT, M.IS_PROGRESS, M.CANCEL_REASON, M.ON_HIDE, M.DETAIL_LOCATION, M.MEETING_HIT FROM MEETING M JOIN LOCATION1 L1 ON M.LOCATION1_NO = L1.LOCATION1_NO JOIN LOCATION2 L2 ON M.LOCATION2_NO = L2.LOCATION2_NO JOIN EXERCISE E ON M.EXERCISE_NO = E.EXERCISE_NO JOIN USERS U ON M.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE M.MEETING_NO = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEETING SET MEETING_HIT = MEETING_HIT + 1 WHERE MEETING_NO = #{param1}

UPDATE MEETING SET MEETING_TITLE = #{meeting_title}, MEETING_DATE = #{meeting_date}, START_GATHER_DATE = #{start_gather_date}, END_GATHER_DATE = #{end_gather_date}, MEETING_MIN = #{meeting_min}, MEETING_MAX = #{meeting_max}, EXERCISE_NO = #{exercise_no}, LOCATION1_NO = #{location1_no}, LOCATION2_NO = #{location2_no}, DETAIL_LOCATION = #{detail_location}, MEETING_CONTENT = #{meeting_content} WHERE MEETING_NO = #{meeting_no}
UPDATE MATERIALS SET MATERIALS_NAME = #{param1} WHERE MEETING_NO = #{param2}
mapper.select: SELECT M.USER_NO, U.USER_NICKNAME, U.USER_MESSAGE, M.MEETING_NO, M.MEETING_TITLE, M.MEETING_DATE, M.EXERCISE_NO, M.CREATED_AT, M.MEETING_MAX, M.MEETING_MIN, E.EXERCISE_NAME FROM MEETING M JOIN USERS U ON M.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN EXERCISE E ON M.EXERCISE_NO = E.EXERCISE_NO WHERE M.USER_NO != #{param1} AND M.EXERCISE_NO = #{param2}

SELECT M.USER_NO, U.USER_NICKNAME, U.USER_MESSAGE, M.MEETING_NO, M.MEETING_TITLE, M.MEETING_HIT, M.MEETING_DATE, M.EXERCISE_NO, M.CREATED_AT, M.MEETING_MAX, M.MEETING_MIN, E.EXERCISE_NAME FROM MEETING M JOIN USERS U ON M.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN EXERCISE E ON M.EXERCISE_NO = E.EXERCISE_NO WHERE MEETING_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{param1}||'%' OR EXERCISE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{param1}||'%'

SELECT M1.EXERCISE_NO, E1.EXERCISE_NAME, M1.MEETING_DATE, M1.MEETING_TITLE, M1.MEETING_NO, M1.MEETING_HIT FROM MEETING M1 INNER JOIN EXERCISE E1 ON E1.EXERCISE_NO = M1.EXERCISE_NO WHERE EXERCISE_NAME = #{param1}
